item.title: Pyforest - Automate Package Import Process for Your Data Science Project
item.description: Usually, the first step we all do for any Python project is importing required packages. So, the beginning of the file usually looks like this: import xxxx as xxx from xxxx import xxxx Importing packages is one of my least favorite parts when I’m working on a Data Scientist project. Packages like pandas, numpy, lighteda, matplotlib.pyplot, and seaborn are commonly used for my projects. I need to repeat this step in every single Jupyter Notebook.

item.title: Switch from Hexo to Hugo
item.description: It’s been a year since last time I update my blog. Recently, I want to get back to writing blog again. However, I encounter some issues. Hexo, the static web generator I used, was not compatible with current node.js version in my system. Somehow node.js was extremely slow in WSL2. I prefer working with the language that I’m more familiar with. Therefore, I start looking for other solutions.

item.title: Automate Image Processing for My Blog
item.description:
:warning:The old cript is DEPRECATED. I switch to FastAPI, and updated the code here. The old code is now in v1.0 Branch.

As you can see, my blog contains cover images. Every time I write an article I need to upload a cover image to the image server. However, the process is complicated and trivial. I need to crop the image to a certain proportion and resize and compress the image to reduce the loading time. Moreover, to put the photographer’s name on the image, I need to use other software. Therefore, I create two python scripts to automate the process.

item.title: Solve the Problem in a April Fool's Joke
item.description: On April 1st, one of the post on v2ex (An online community of developers and designers in China1) become viral. The post title is “Seeking Dates” and it is posted on April 1st, so most reactions of this post are pointing out that this is the “new trap” of the recruiters. Here is the translation: I am born and raised in Hangzhou. I am a science student at Zhejiang University … I hope to find a man can pass the following test.
